{"title": "Twilight Cherry", "title_search": "twilight cherry", "title_keyword": "twilight cherry", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/twilight-cherry/", "summary": "Twilight Cherry is an original visual novel for  iPad,iPhone and iPod Touch.  Both of Japanese/English are available. Language can be switched anytime.  It has multi-endings, so the story may be changed by your selection. One ending is available per one girl.  Both of girls are your childhood friends.  * Hina *  Japanese, but she has blonde hair because she is quater white. She always complains to you, who is a indolent boy. But she helps you, having you at heart.  * Satsuki *  She is a black-haired girl, and beautiful rather than cute. Sometimes she is blind with her (one-sided) lover, in short, you. So she approaches you passionately.    *** Game Introduction ***  Make it further than just a friend! Hints for the selections You just have to select a girl you liked. You can play wherever you are!  --- Automatic save  You use not only 5 normal save slot, but also 1 auto save slot. The game will be saved there when the story goes.  So if you close the app without saving, you'll able to resume the next time.  Text log is also saved. Make good use for recall.  If you don't have enough time to play the whole at a stretch, this function will help you.  --- Touch girls with your fingers!  "Communication mode":Touching girls  At some certain places, you may touch the girls.  You can touch several points, for example, head or shoulder. Girls may react to your touch. Their reactions depend on where you touched--Wait and see.  *** Spec ***  How to control  Seeing the next text:Tap with one finger Opening the menu:Tap with two fingers Seeing the text log:Flick up Hiding the text window:Flick left  Skipping texts you already read:Flick right Skipping any texts:Tap with three fingers  These controls get enabled when the main part is started.  --- Sounds  BGM:Available Sound Effects:None Voice:None  --- Extra mode  Showing pictures:Available Playing BGMs:Available  --- How auto-save works  It's disabled till you see the third message from the start.  After then, the game will be saved into auto save slot automatically when you close this app.  Of course you can load from auto save slot normally, but it's more convenient to tap "Resume" on the title screen. Then the game is loaded from auto save slot.  *** About this app ***  Major staffs  Original paintings/Graphics:Seara Scenario:Hyper Y Effects:Kazu Musics:Label CLach  --- Opinions & Impressions  Presented by:m-kz   support@m-kz.com", "genre": ["Adventure"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-05-21", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-154984-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-154984-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": [], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}

{"title": "EGGS", "title_search": "eggs", "title_keyword": "eggs", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/eggs/", "summary": "It's hugely playable, instantly fun and very addictive!  Poor old Luigi.. Eggsville's famous annual Omelette Eating Competition is only two hours away and raccoons have stolen all his ingredients! Will you be able to help him gather enough eggs to save the day? Or will our hero end up with egg on his face..?!  Gameplay: Keep gathering freshly-laid eggs as the gameplay becomes more and more frantic. Careful not to drop them.. lose all your lives and it's over for our hero! Catch golden eggs to unlock bonus rounds where the pace gets even more insane but there's huge scores and extra lives to be earned. You won't lose a life if you don't catch a golden egg, but your progress towards the next round, and ever bigger scores will be slower..  Post your score to your facebook wall and compete with your friends. You're guaranteed to have stiff competition in no time..  Combo Points: Push your score even higher by building combo points - there's bonus points at 10, 50 and an extra life at 100! Drop just one egg and you'll have to starting building combos all over again..  Controls: It couldn't be simpler: Hold the iPhone or iPod Touch in both hands and use your thumps to tap the screen where you want luigi to hold his frying pan.  Player Feedback: + "This is my favorite game! {"title": "Magic Ludo", "title_search": "magic ludo", "title_keyword": "magic ludo", "url": "https://www.metacritic.com/game/magic-ludo/", "summary": "GameFront proudly presents Magic Ludo, the first iPhone Ludo game that comes with 3 versions of Ludo.  Ludo is a classical board game played widely in Europe, Africa and Asia. Now it is on iPhone & iPod Touches, with many different rules, styles and game-plays. It requires dice luck and strategy thinking. Each game takes about 5-7 mins, perfect for your bus & train rides.  The game mimics four castles and their knights trying to go home, fighting each other on their way.  "Suddenly, the clouds came and shadowed every path. Only the courageous will survive!" - Yes, Magic Ludo comes with in-app purchases that allows additional content to be downloaded. We promise to launch new boards and levels every 2 weeks.  Challenge play lets single player challenge different missions like Gogogo, Serial Killer and Time Trial. It also provides tutorial for those new to Ludo.  Casual play allows 1 - 4 players challenge each other on unlocked boards and missions. Savor the moment of triumph when you send opponent pieces home.  The 3 versions of Ludo. - Classic mode, played in Europe and various parts of the World: No stacking - Chinese mode, also known as: Stacking, flying, big stack advantage - African mode, played in Africa: Stacking, stack blocking and movement penalty  To play, download Magic Ludo today!", "genre": ["Board"], "metascore": 0, "critic_reviews": 0, "user_score": 0, "user_reviews": 0, "release_date": "2010-01-13", "images": ["https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-141682-17.jpg", "https://www.metacritic.com/a/img/catalog/provider/6/12/6-1-141682-17.jpg"], "video": null, "video_thumbnail": null, "video_type": null, "sentiment": null, "must_play": false, "crew": null, "countries": ["North America"], "companies": ["GameFront Singapore (Publisher)", "GameFront Singapore (Developer)"], "platforms": ["iOS (iPhone/iPad)"], "rating": null}
